characters.name: Tasuku  Kaname
characters.description: Tasuku Kaname (要介, Kaname Tasuku) is the main character of Shimanami Tasogare and a high school student at Shimanami High, who is troubled by his sexual orientation and his affection for his schoolmate Touma Tsubaki.

characters.name: Touma Tsubaki
characters.description: Touma Tsubaki is a character from the manga Shimanami Tasogare, the ace of the Shimanami High volleyball club and Tasuku Kaname's crush. He and Tasuku are on the Health Committee together.

characters.name: Haruko Daichi
characters.description: Haruko is a frequent visitor of the Lounge and a member of the Cat Clowder. After being commissioned by Anonymous, she renovated the Lounge with friends she met through a gay community on Twitter. She's living with her wife, Saki, who she met through that community.

characters.name: Natsuyoshi Utsumi
characters.description:
Utsumi is a friend of Haruko, who he met through a gay community on Twitter. He is a member of the Cat Clowder Vacant House Restoration Non-Profit and a frequent visitor of the lounge.
~!In chapter 11, it is revealed that he is a trans man.!~

characters.name: Chaiko
characters.description:
Chaiko is an older gentleman who often hangs out around the lounge and enjoys playing classical music.
~!Chaiko is gay, and his partner of 30 years is in the hospital for terminal cancer.!~

characters.name: Anonymous
characters.description: Anonymous is the mysterious founder and owner of the Lounge. They are asexual and, as Kamatani Yuuki has stated, of indeterminate gender identity.

characters.name: Shuuji Misora
characters.description: Misora is in sixth grade and prefers to dress as a girl whenever he's at the lounge. He is unsure about what gender he identifies as. He has multiple older sisters and is called Shuuji at home.
